message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $145. I believe it will be very beneficial to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to save as much as I can.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $135? It's a fair price that considers the value this product offers.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. How about we meet at $130? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
